channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC

item.title: Report E-2023110257
item.description:
Report E-2023110257

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: SUMMERVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver said vapor rail had product in line and spilled on ground. Then clean with spill rags and tried to wash down with water hose. Driver failed to report incident and it was reported by another driver. CDG managed the spill cleanup and estimated 20 gallons of gasoline was spilled. Driver was terminated.
